Articles.Content:
This challenge is to create a rover to get as far from the KSC as possible however we have the following restrictions.

1-The rover must be wheel driven.

2-The rover must start from the ksc runway

3-You may not use any solar panels or nuclear power.

4-The rover must have a minimum crew of one Kerbal

5-The rover must be capable of doing science and transmitting it back to ksc

6-Stock parts only

Good luck and post your results
Someone could just use a jet engine to provide some electricity.
Or you could make a fuel cell, two oppositely facing rocket engines

Everybody figured out how to beat the challenge but isn't going to actually do it?

(I'm AFlaptop for a couple days yet, might hit this when I get back)
